item.description:
Wonderful early music by a choir from England - we did this 2 or 3 years ago. Very festive evening of early Christmas music - 

 

Puer Natus Est — Tudor Music for Christmas and Advent

Celebrate the holiday season with the sublime voices of Stile Antico! This self-directed group of singers has won praise and acclaim spanning the globe for their exquisite performances balancing precise tone with soaring beauty. They return to Boston with a program of immense grandeur and delicate grace featuring sparkling masterworks for the Christmas and Advent seasons by Tallis, Byrd, Taverner, Sheppard, and other Tudor composers.

Free pre-concert talk at 7pm - meet there at 6.55 pm or turn up for the concert at 7.55 pm.

 

I have bought 4 tix for this show which are now all gone - however IF more of you want to come there may still be tickets left to buy on Artsboston.org or at the Stile Antico website OR you could just show up and hope to buy at the door.

 

We will meet for an early dinner at Daedalus at 5. 30 pm.  That's very close by at 45 1/2 Mt. Auburn St. Great opportunity to do some Xmas shopping in Harvard Square during the afternoon! Please call me if you plan to join us for dinner too. See my email for phone number.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at the church or in Daedalus first -
item.name: Stile Antico in Cambridge this Saturday
